verses.roman:
āmāra nāṭaka pṛthak karaha racana
"āmāra kṛpāte nāṭaka haibe vilakṣaṇa"

synonyms: āmāra nāṭaka—my drama; pṛthak karaha racana—write separately; āmāra kṛpāte—by my mercy; nāṭaka—the drama; haibe—will be; vilakṣaṇa—extraordinarily beautiful.
translation: "Write a separate drama about me," she said. "By my mercy, it will be extraordinarily beautiful."
